## Checklist

### General

- [ ] Code follows project conventions
- [ ] Tests pass locally
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] Reviewed my own code before requesting review

### Agent / Code Review (FR77)

- [ ] **Security:** Security scan run (or N/A / documented)
- [ ] **Test coverage:** Unit/integration tests added or updated; coverage meets project bar (e.g. 80%)
- [ ] **Shared libraries:** Lambdas/backend use `@ai-learning-hub/*` where applicable (logging, middleware, db, validation, types) (or N/A for docs-only PRs)
- [ ] **Pattern compliance:** No Lambda-to-Lambda calls; API-first; error responses follow ADR-008
- [ ] **CLAUDE.md / .claude/docs:** Conventions and patterns respected (see CLAUDE.md and `.claude/docs/`)
